data.title: St. George Coptic Orthodox Church
data.meta_description: A Coptic Orthodox Church located in Kirkland, WA with services for the Greater Seattle Area. Liturgies prayer every Wednesday and Sunday. Check our website and social media for more information.
data.text:
You can donate directly from your Bank website or app:

In your bank app or website, click "Pay & Transfer" and look for the Zelle option

Use Zelle to send one time or recurring payments to our address: treasurer@stgeorgeseattle.org

Please include the donor's name in the Zelle transfer message.

If you would like to mail the Church a check, kindly make it out to St. George Coptic Orthodox Church and send it to the following address:

‍

13216 NE 100th St.

Kirkland, WA 98033‍

If you would like to wire money directly to the Church, please email donations@stgeorgeseattle.org for wiring instructions.

If you would like to automate your donation please setup a the church as bill in your bank account with the following address

13216 NE 100th St.

Kirkland, WA 98033
